title: Textile, "Length of block printed linen", 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Brown basket of flowers on a mound, contains exotic red flowers and a purple and brown bird. On either side basket, serpentine branches with exotic, red, purple, blue-green and purple leaves. Condition: soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Length of block printed linen", 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-61.
